website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for those who want a CCW dress belt.
pros: The look of leather with a polymer insert for extra stiffness
cons: When carrying a firearm, movement makes it squeak

customer_reviews.title: A Sturdy Choice
customer_reviews.text: I picked this belt up for a holster presentation class which required a rigid IWB or OWB holster and two magazine pouches. The belt definitely looks like a normal belt (I got the black one) and fits quite well. It is reinforced and provides more than enough strength to hold everything in place, especially when quickly drawing from a holster. I wear a size 40" and purchased the 44" belt which gave me more than enough options to make the belt exactly as tight as I needed.
customer_reviews.author: MarisaLZ

customer_reviews.title: Buy them you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: The finest belts I have owned. I have bought them in various colors and a spare of my brown/brass one. I have had my first one for over 8 years. I am rough on my gear most my belts look bad or fail well before this. Instead I get consistently asked where I bought my belt. I have gifted four of these belts. Everyone I have bought one for has said it is their favorite belt. FYI- For a proper fit, buy 2” bigger than the waist size of your pants.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Z

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse Deal Not
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price on a Warehouse deal and I see why. Obviously the customer that returned it was hard on it or substituted a used belt in it's place. Leather "cracking" marks on the belt surface and a well worn in hole for the buckle. Poor or no inspection by whomever received this return. Supervision needs to supervise and not allow their customers an unpleasant surprise. Nice looking , from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: USA1

customer_reviews.title: Great belt...but I don't use it
customer_reviews.text: Love it...but I don't use it. It's a very heavy duty CCW belt. Very sturdy. I have found that it is actually too heavy for my needs. I'm able to use a standard belt with an IWB holster - gun stays in place with no sag. So, is it a good belt? Yes, it's a great belt. Would I recommend it? It depends. I'm able to easily support a G19 in an IWB holster with a standard belt. Here's an idea...try your holster and gun with your standard belt before buying. I wish I would've done that.
customer_reviews.author: dennis e.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: This belt is very high quality and VERY stiff with the polymer insert. Great belt for concealed carry. Don't have any other CC belts to compare it with, but I doubt any other brand is better for the price. Highly recommend. Also recommend that you go to their website first to see how to choose the correct size. Do not rely on the Amazon chart. Aker Leather is very specific in their sizing. I followed their recommendation and got exactly the right size. You'll find their sizing instructions under "Order Info" on their website.
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt...not sized properly
customer_reviews.text: Belt is of excellent quality. Very sturdy. The only complaint I had was that the belt was cut to small. Went to the Aker website and they suggested ordering the next size up from your pants size. I wear a size 36 comfortably, so I ordered the size 38 belt. Belt only reached second notch from the tip of the belt when I tried it on. Would work fine for OWB holster but not for IWB holster. Had to reorder belt in the next size up (40). Again, love the belt. Works great. Would recommend two sizes up if you consider this belt. To big is better than to small.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the belt and 1 star for amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I give 5 stars for the belt and -5 for amazon warehouse deals. I order a size 38 for my 34/36 waist. The Aker package had size B13-TP-38 printed on the outside, but the belt had stamped size 42 on it. There was an amazondeals warehouse inspected sticker on the package. This is the 2nd purchase in a row that I made from warehouse deals which has come defected. The prior purchase was an Otter Box for an iPad and two tabs of the case were broken. It too had been inspected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short for the stated size & only 5 holes
customer_reviews.text: Good & Bad. The concept of concealed carry covers IWB & OWB wear. This belt looks and feels wonderful. It's stiff enough with the insert sandwiched between the layers of leather to handle the weight of a weapon, and the belt is finished very nicely. The problem is that this belt only has 5 adjustment holes. When using an IWB holster you need to add approximately 2" for the additional thickness. It often depends upon what position you carry your holster in. Two extra belt holes would help. Also, you pay by the length. I bought a belt several inches longer than I've used in the past and it's still not long enough to comfortably carry IWB.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Great for concealed carry, dress and casual. Heirloom quality durable. Sick of wasting money on $20 or $30 belts that only last a year and are no good for concealed carry? Get some that look great, you can wear all the time, are great for concealed carry, and will last half a century.
customer_reviews.author: Booker D

customer_reviews.title: 4 Years of everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This belt has held up better than any other belt I've owned. Wear after 4 years of everyday use is not bed but functionally the belt works like new just to hold my paths up or for IWB carry. Highly recommend it based on it still being functional after all the use.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice belt all around. I would recommend following the fitting instructions listed, I measured my old belt per instructions and the belt fits perfectly with room to adjust both up or down depending on needs. This is very nice looking belt, can be worn with a pair of jeans or with a suit. Even if you don't conceal carry, this belt would also work well for anyone looking for a belt with more support. Construction seems solid and I will update after a few months of solid wear.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBlue73

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Perfection For Every Day Carry
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a belt. I ordered it 2" larger than the waist size on my pants and this was the correct decision. I carry a full size M&P , and finding a belt that looked good and was durable has been a challenge. I had a Galco Lite,carry belt and it was absolute junk in comparison. The leather is thick and sturdy on this one, and it will almost stand up on it's own. The stitching is perfect, and yes I checked it. It looks good, is supersturdy, and will accomplish it's mission with ease. Thanks, Aker, for a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Alte Soldat

customer_reviews.title: Akers has been a go to for over 15 years
customer_reviews.text: The belt I currently use is about 10 years old and the stitching started to fall apart. Otherwise it’s a very comfortable to this day. The new belt seems to have changed a bit in construction and is stiffer than the old one was new. I’d still buy it as it works well for its intended purpose, but hope it breaks in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Da Bear In Tx

customer_reviews.title: Use their fitting instructions it will fit right the first time.
customer_reviews.text: I carry a handgun concealed daily and my old belt was pretty wiped out. I wasn't looking forward to another $70-80 gun leather accessory. So I see this for 50 some bucks and thought why not? So the belt is good so far after about a week it fits perfect using their procedure..tks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gunbelt
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a competitive price. The Kydex in the belt really makes the difference to me. I don't think leather is enough anymore, there needs to be something else to really stiffen the belt up and that's what you get here. Using it for months with no "Droop" and it actually allows me to wear my belt a bit loser but actually hold my gun in place better. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny but research the size you'll need
customer_reviews.text: I never believed that a carry belt could make this much difference. I am not one of those guys that goes gear crazy (probably the opposite) and was really reluctant to drop what I though was a crazy amount of money for a belt. For whatever reason though, I decided to take the leap after looking at these things for about a year. If you are like me and on the fence you will not be disappointed if you buy one of these belts. Please read all the other reviews and take note to sizing suggestions. These belts run small. Like 4 sizes small.
customer_reviews.author: The Dubz

customer_reviews.title: Good belt, but be careful if you need to change the buckle!
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use I thought I would never need another gun belt. This one doesn't sag, doesn't stretch, and has worked very well for inside and outside the waistband carry. Sadly, the buckle looks terrible after a year of wear, so I decided to put on a new one. I went to unbutton the snaps and one of them popped completely out. Looks like I'll have to either find someone that can repair it, or buy a new belt.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Strong and well made
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I've purchased an Aker belt. After over two years, my first one was in GREAT shape, but I lost it, and because it was such high-quality product, I bought one in brown and one in black. You'll get many years of continuous use out of these belts (don't loose it them).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: While they are rarely as comfortable or cheap as a department store belt
customer_reviews.text: Gun belts are a necessary evil. They spread out the weight and prevent the holster from rising with the gun when you draw. Try a quick draw (with a unloaded pistol) with your current holster attached to a non-gun belt. While they are rarely as comfortable or cheap as a department store belt, they are a critical component in you carry setup. This belt is very reasonably priced given its' quality, durability and function.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, but beware of sizing
customer_reviews.text: The belt is very nice looking and well made. If not for the weight and thickness, it looks like a nice dress belt and not recognizable as a gun belt. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the sizing. Basically the sizes are all one inch short from standard belt sizes. I ordered a 36 inch and it was actually a 35. I replaced it with a 38 which actually is a 37. Instead of using the center hole, I need to use the 4th one. If you can live with a belt size that's one notch off from the normal belt, then you should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: THANKS AKER!!  GREAT QUALITY, FIT AND FINISH!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolutely best belt I've ever had!! It is very well made with nice brass features and it is nice and stiff, no roll over with a holster. The finish of the leather is great and I took a pair of calipers and measured the thickness and it really is .25" thick! I recommend this belt to anyone that is looking for a heavy duty belt that sells for $80 to $100 because this one is approximately $50 and worth much more!
customer_reviews.author: zackafack

customer_reviews.title: This is the belt to get!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these several years ago at a shop in Brunswick, GA while I was on travel, and it is still in great shape. I had been wanting to get another one just to have a spare, and ordered a second one online from amazon. It arrived quickly, and I am even more impressed with this belt and newer styled buckle. If you carry a couple of heavy things on your belt regularly, then you need this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Pilotguy299

customer_reviews.title: Aker makes excellent products
customer_reviews.text: After 10 years or so with my previous reinforced belt, worn nearly daily, it finally gave up the ghost. This was a great option; yes, they are pricey, but it is a quality item that will last years. Probably wear this belt 300 days a year; if I got 3000 uses of of a $50 product, well, I consider well spend. Don't hesitate, if you need a reinforced belt for carrying a weapon, radio, tools, etc this is high quality item. Don't skimp.
customer_reviews.author: JTRJR603

customer_reviews.title: Aker Leather always quality for fair price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this Aker Leather belt is as always very good quality. However, the sizing was off and I had to return it to Amazon for that reason. Other than that I've always been a fan of Aker Leather products and would recommend them to anyone that wants quality leather for a fair price. Just be aware that for their belts the sizing may not be what you're used to.
customer_reviews.author: Makadamia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt for IWB carry
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, love this for IWB carry. I followed the measurement guide on the Aker website...I measured out at 36 inches and bought the 38 inch length per the instructions. Couldn't be happier with the length and it does a great job of supporting the weight of my handgun. When carrying IWB I still have 2 adjustment holes left and when not carrying I have 3 open holes on the belt. The fit is just right as it allows for spare magazine carry on my left side since there is not a lot of excess belt to get in the way. I'm glad I picked one of these up, it's my go-to option for concealed carry belts.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: good sturdy belt
customer_reviews.text: good sturdy belt. i rated 3 stars only because the belt seems to be smaller than advertised size. It is 3 inches shorter than the same size belt from different brand
customer_reviews.author: gtstiles

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Went thru 3 belts in a year, last two were custom made from one layer of bull hide. A few months around my spare tire and the things would look like the road course at Pocono. Hard to draw your 45 with your pants down to your knees. I carry 24/7 and this belt looks like new after 8 months. It's much more comfortable than a single hide belt, it can be worn looser and still do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: I already had one of these in brown so it ...
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these in brown so it was only natural to get one in black. If you carry either open or concealed these belts are the way to go you do not have to pull the belt tight as hell to get the gun to carry right and that makes them more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is and always will be one of my favorite belts. Super durable and a great belt for concealed carry. Doesn’t “stretch” but fits well!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality, A Bit Short
customer_reviews.text: This is a really superb belt with a very nice heavy cast brass parts. However, as others have pointed out, they run about an inch short, so order a size larger then you normally would. The holes are at the exact right length, but the end is shorter than most.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Muenchen

customer_reviews.title: Stiff. Works well for it's intended use. Nice looking, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Used while working, retired now so I don't use it on a daily basis. It's stiff, but that's the whole idea behind a holster belt. Nice looking, well made, functional for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Solid belt, well constructed and sturdy enough for any holster you may use for concealed carry. The belt is suitable for dress use (bought a black one too) and not easily recognizable as a gun belt. The one caveat is to make sure your pants don't have stylishly narrow belt loops that would make this niot fit. Pay attention to the sizing guides.
customer_reviews.author: Hemlock

customer_reviews.title: I just received the belt and the quality appears excellent. As to sizing
customer_reviews.text: I just received the belt and the quality appears excellent. As to sizing, my pants are a size 38 and I ordered a 42 inch belt size as others have said the belts run small. They are 100% correct. The belt runs small and you also need to take the little extra room for the holster into account along with that knowledge. Size it according to what I suggested and it will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. With the flimsy belt I was wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't justify buying a $100 so I read all the reviews and settles on this one, I followed the measuring instructions and tried it on as soon as I received it. Perfect fit. With the flimsy belt I was wearing my holster would slide out of position and need regular adjustment, this belt prevented all that, it also kept my handgun snug against my body so even when I bent down I had very little printing.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lovins

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality...I carry up to 15 hrs a day. This belt is making that easier...
customer_reviews.author: W.T.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this belt for 3.5 years now and came back to order another one. I’ve accidentally swam with this belt on in salt water multiple times as well. Have worn it daily for years. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. Have been using it everyday for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Have been using it everyday for a month so far. Did come a little smaller than expected, I also saw some of the similar complaints of the end being too short. Only problem I am having is since it is so stiff, it has been digging into my hip bones. I do believe with some more time of using it, that it will break in more. May buy another one in brown eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and classic
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy belt and matches my galco holster perfectly. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Odice L.

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes up and you'll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt, especially for 1/2 the price of a similar Galco. I wish the Amazon selection included the chrome hardware for the brown belt. I liked the black one so much I paid extra to order the brown with chrome directly from Aker. Definitely order 2 sizes up. I wear 38 in most pants and the 42 belt is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JPescado

customer_reviews.title: This belt has replaced my regular leather belt.
customer_reviews.text: I like this belt so much, I wear it everyday. Unlike regular belts, it doesn't damage as easily when using the same belt hole. Whether you carry a holster or not, this is a great belt to use every day. The buckle looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This belt is awesome and works well for professional attire without looking cheap
customer_reviews.text: This belt is awesome and works well for professional attire without looking cheap. I have several different gun belts for professional attire in the past and this is by far the best. I went one size up from my pants size when ordering and worked perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Digby Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, great versatility for a carry belt
customer_reviews.text: Wear it everyday. A good, sturdy, plainly designed belt suitable for work, play, and carry. Doesn't have that tactical cowboy look that is prevalent with much of the gear designed for carrying a holster and weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, but beware of the size
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, but beware of the size. I wear size 32 pants and based on reviews that told me it was smaller than anticipated i got a size 34 belt...and it was too small! Should have gotten a 36. The length of the 34 is the same as my 32 belts probably because there is a 2 inch flap after the buckle that they are probably counting. Don't be afraid to get 4 sizes more than the actual oant size, you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: I. Shkolnik

customer_reviews.title: Great gun belt
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing it every day. Very rigid & very comfortable. I've never owned a real gun belt for my edc. It really does make a HUGE difference. Get this belt & throw away all those other crappy belts you have, you'll never wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: H3stin

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! It's perfect for everyday wear and so sturdy I can carry concealed and not worry about shifting or sagging. It's a must buy even if you do not carry since it fits well, keeps its shape, and is comfortable to wear daily.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: just received my ccw belt today. I thought it was the nicest looking one on Amazon and it defiantly is. Even nicer in real life. Very sturdy and well made. A belt you can wear with anything. Very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Park

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: This gun belt has exceeded my expectations, and shows good quality and craftsmanship! It is stiff and easily supports the weight of my 1911 full framed pistol without any sagging or issues using my inside the waistband holster. I would highly recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: James Hill

customer_reviews.title: I finally have a belt that holds the gun up in the right position without drooping.
customer_reviews.text: Stiff enough and correct size for both my competition OWB gun and holster and concealed IWB gun and holster. Looks great to wear even without a holster although stiffness needs some getting used to. Wear 34 pants (which are just a little large) and the 38 inch belt was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacktana

customer_reviews.title: must have for CCW
customer_reviews.text: My last Aker belt lasted nearly 10 years of daily wear. This one is just as good. I plan to get many years of service out of it. A must have for carrying a handgun. I've tried several other brands that don't even come close to the quality of the Aker.
customer_reviews.author: bigphil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt.
customer_reviews.text: Belt works great with my concealed carry Beretta; I did use the manufacturers suggestion for getting the measurement right and size right. The belt is first quality leather. The composite liner keeps the belt from sagging or twisting over. Happy Campfer.
customer_reviews.author: RickM46

customer_reviews.title: Aker leather belt wise choice for apendix Hoslter.
customer_reviews.text: I love Aker Leather Belt B21 11/2... Fit well and keeps a good base foundation when I use my apendix holster for my Glock 27 & Berretta 9mm sub compact. Keep in mind of size which I take a 38 waist and order size 42 which fits well. Lenght of the belt is a little shorter then other belts in size.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Landrau

customer_reviews.title: Nice Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt, nice and stiff, looks good for everyday use. I wear 38" pants and got the 42" belt. That seems to be the right size. It works with or without IWB holster.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: First CCW belt I've owned. Made a world of difference over my regular heavy leather belt. Couldn't believe it. Thought it was worth the gamble and glad I got it - not sure how long it will survive, but initially having had it for a while, I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: DanJSX

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt It is plenty solid enough for IWB or OWB carry. I wear in addition to suspenders at this time because of recent surgery and even not cinched up tight, I feel confident with this belt as part of my carry rig.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit--huge difference now carrying all my models. Definitely glad people continually recommend this product. I'm doing the same, if you're looking for a great EDC belt with a solid fashionable look--this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman67

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a gun belt. It couldn't hold up a sammich, let alone my 1911. I now use it for work, since I can't carry there. I'm pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic belt! Very stiff, but breaks in quickly. I carry a Ruger P89 pistol, and it hold it just fine behind the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: The perfect concealed carry belt
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this belt now since I received it 2014. It has not stretched, sagged nor have the holes elongated. This is by far the best belt I have ever used in conjunction with carrying a sidearm and I have been carrying a sidearm now for 50 years. I would and have recommended it to every one that has told me they were looking for a new belt. Best bang for the buck you can find!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reese

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gun belt. Has held up good so far, very happy with my purchase. Awesome quality for the price. Will be getting a brown one soon as well. Fit and finish are excellent! Buy some of these before the price goes up...

customer_reviews.title: - good looking, dressy belt - sturdy Cons

But, the return was no hassle, which was also awesome! Let's just say I'm so satisfied I'm ordering another for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most important piece of concealed carry gear you'll ever own.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order the correct size!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great so far, I'll update this review after a few months of regular use. But after a day of wearing it the improvement is definitely huge. Feels very sturdy and no belt sag! As far as size, if you carry IWB, you definitely need to add 4" to 6" depending on how large of a holster you've got. The sizes provided are very accurate, but reflect the size of the belt at the last hole. So if you order your size it won't be able to fit an IWB holster. But other than that it's awesome, so far. As I said, I'll update in a few months of use.
